Amando 'AJ' Ibañez
April 24, 1989 - August 15, 2023
born Amando Pilapil Ibañez to Leticia Pilapil and Amando Ibañez, passed on August 15, 2023 from a rare form of liver cancer (Cholangiocarcinoma). He is survived by his wife, Krizzia Ibañez; his daughter, Celine Ibañez; his sisters, Aja Pilapil and Aljhecia Alolor; and his brothers, Carlmelo and Eugene Ibañez. AJ was a dedicated father and husband. As a talented musician he spent his days playing guitar, finger drumming on his MPC and recording and producing music. AJ recently completed his Cybersecurity certification at San Francisco City College, and as an aspiring technologist, had ambitions to explore the field of data science. What he loved most, undoubtedly, was spending time with family and friends. AJ was well-known for his positivity and charisma. Departing too soon, he leaves a large void in our hearts. Please join us in celebrating his life in the coming days.
